title: A Night on the Town
description: Married couples John & Joanne Macaulay, Chris & Jackie Morgan, and Derek & Alison Moffatt compete for prizes, using riddles provided by the variety stars of the day. But can they avoid the booby prize of a brand new dustbin?

title: Winners
description: The theme this week is performers who have won the Club Mirror national club act awards.

title: Episode #10.1
description: The themes and the missing words game are dropped, and the 3 couples now compete directly against each other with buzzers on general knowledge. Plus, a weekly newcomer is welcomed to the stage.
